content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the district court in ljubljana the case identified as settlement p 842014 lasted for 9 months and 7 days starting on january 13 2014 and ending on october 20 2014 the parties involved were responsible for covering the costs of the procedure the final resolution stated that the defendant who owns an apartment building along with its furniture appliances and equipment must divide these assets with the plaintiff additionally the defendant is ordered to pay the plaintiff a sum of 37500 eur the court made its decision based on specific laws the details of the settlements reached in court are confidential and not available for translation

metadata.cost: Each party bears their own costs
